revised_title: A Case of Extraordinary Exostoses on the Back of a Boy
tldr: The author presents a case study of a boy with large, unusual bone growths on his back, which began three years prior and continued to grow. The growths arose from all the vertebrae of the neck and reached down to the sacrum, as well as from every rib of the boy's body. The boy had no other symptoms of rickets in any joint of his limbs.
